text: Hey. Does anyone know whether you can add multiple root domains to your account. At the moment we use HubSpot for sub domains to build out landing pages and blogs but I am looking to create a whole website on a different domain. Would this need a separate HubSpot account?

Yes you can create additional domains on HubSpot.
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cms-general/use-brand-domains-with-your-HubSpot-tools>

Review the “using brand domains with your HubSpot tools” section of that page though. There are important restrictions based on portal type, and whether you have the brand domain addon

<https://www.HubSpot.com/products/brand-domains>
The brand-domains page is very good at explaining the reasons you might prefer brand domains or might prefer a  separate portal. It completely depends on your use-case.
This is great thanks. Do you know if the add on is available for professional or only available on the enterprise tier.
